website_summaries.verdict: Little builders will love bulldozing, lifting, loading, transporting, and tipping blocks before getting to work on the construction site.
pros: Comes with 3 buildable and functioning construction vehicles (bulldozer, dump truck, and crane) plus 3 helmet-clad construction workers to help get the job done
Plenty of extra blocks for imaginative building
Works as a standalone set for passionate builders or as an imaginative add-on element for a smaller DUPLO set
cons: Construction theme might not be every kid’s cup of tea

customer_reviews.title: A really good item for kids who are truck OBSESSED like my ...
customer_reviews.text: A really good item for kids who are truck OBSESSED like my 3 year old. I was starting to get a little annoyed that my son only seemed to be interested in playing with trucks and wanted him to find some other toys to play with. We got him this and he was so pumped! He now LOVES all things legos and spends hours building towers, robots, trucks. I am so happy to see him being creative and building vs just pushing cars around all day. Plus, I think my husband has just as much fun as my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Salrin

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son LOVES this set. It has enough pieces to be fun even without add-on sets. And there are enough combinations possible to keep the kids entertained for hours. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mama

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my son who is 2 yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son who is 2 yrs old. The biggest benefit of these is that he can spend hours now constructing and deconstructing, and as he matures and develops his skills, his use of the blocks will also change and develop.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyMumma

customer_reviews.title: Best present for a child
customer_reviews.text: I’m an aunt and a godmother and I always choose and will (while it’s age-appropriate) to gift my kids with Lego sets. I’ve witnessed kids’ eyes light up, excitement grow and genuine fun rise. I am a strong believer that building with Lego blocks: 1) Promotes motor skills 2) Improves creativity and engineering thinking 3) Develops persistence and planning skills 4) Encourages problem solving and mathematical thinking I’ve witnessed kids play with it for hours, engaged and eager to accomplish!
customer_reviews.author: Lenok

customer_reviews.title: Love LEGO
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he loves them. You can never go wrong with buying LEGO for a child regardless of age, sex, religion, ethnicity or any other protected category. My son built them, tore them apart, built other things, threw them, tried to eat them, built more stuff, left them on the floor for me to step on, built more things. Despite the pain these cause while being stepped on, I still love these and love the imagination that they inspire in my son.
customer_reviews.author: CBeck09

customer_reviews.title: Great toy with a disappointing flaw
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this toy immediately, but as we began to put it together we were hugely disappointed that the crane (which is his favorite part) was impossible to operate correctly because the base of the crane, which is supposed to snap onto the orange square that is the top of the tower, would not successfully attach. So to operate the crane my grandson must get someone else to hold the cab of the crane in place, meaning he can't play with it by himself. If it were not for this significant flaw I would rate this toy with the highest ratings across the board.
customer_reviews.author: dutch pie

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler who loves construction vehicles!
customer_reviews.text: Def MUST have for a toddler who loves construction cars. My son got this for his 2nd birthday as he is into dump truck and other construction vesicles. We've been having some other duplo sets prior to this so this was a great addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: hedgeStar

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddler Imagination
customer_reviews.text: This set was one of the first Duplo sets purchased for my three-year-old boys. While they do get frustrated with it at times, and it didn’t stay together long, they love creating with Duplos. They love the dump truck as it can be used as a tow truck, platform for the backhoe, etc. Downside of any Duplo/LEGO set is the cost compared to the amount of pieces you get in a set.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2 year old that loves everything construction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 2 year old that loves everything construction. We read "Goodnight, goodnight construction site" after playing with these duplos.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, so much fun! Should have more diverse “construction workers”
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other duplo products this has fantastic value - so many parts! Instant fun! Our package arrived with the clamshell digger part missing (it’s exposed in a cutout from the box). I called LEGO and they said they would send a replacement. Thanks! It is interesting though that it comes with with three figures, and they are all Caucasian-looking males. Maybe women or minirities can be construction workers too? This a gripe I have about the classic LEGO stuff anyway. The “friends” sets show more diversity but subtle messages start at Duplo age.
customer_reviews.author: shopper in the northwest 9999999

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our son in 2018. He was 4 years old at the time. He loved playing with the crane! One year later and he still plays with this set. He loves spinning the crane around, building towers to attach it to, and trying to pick up different toys with it! This LEGO set it great quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: It's a  toy
customer_reviews.text: For the most part the grandkids love it. The only thing that keeps it from being 5 stars is the orange platform that the crane base sets on to allow it to swivel is a piece of junk. Every time you touch the crane it falls off the platform. The rest of the kit is great and overall still worth the money.

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO Big Construction Site 10813 Building Set with Toy Dump Truck, Toy Crane and Toy Bulldozer for a complete Toddler Construction Toy Set (67 Pieces)
product_meta.description:
Toddlers' imaginations will run wild with this construction toy set complete with 3 buildable construction vehicles and toy construction workers. Kids will clear the toy construction site with the tracked toy bulldozer, before tipping new building supplies from the toy dump truck. Then they'll use the toy crane with its claw and posable arm to hoist bricks and construct a toy building. LEGO DUPLO large building bricks are specially designed to be safe for little hands. This construction set also includes 3 construction worker LEGO DUPLO figures to encourage lots of creative play.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO DUPLO Town
feature_bullets: Spark your toddler's young imagination with this build your own construction set full of construction vehicles and extra building bricks! They'll spend hours in pretend play with this unique construction toy set.

This building toy includes a toy bulldozer, toy dump truck with tipping bucket, and toy crane with rotating cabin, movable arm, and working claw. Plus, three construction worker LEGO DUPLO figures with safety helmets, a wheelbarrow, and tools.

LEGO DUPLO building toys are the perfect toddler toys for boys and girls as they are made for small hands and are compatible with other LEGO DUPLO sets, such as additional construction sets, for creative play
Kids can also engage in creative play with the new, free LEGO DUPLO stories skill on Echo that utilizes storytelling for kids with this toy construction site

This 67 piece set is ideal for boys and girls between the ages of 2-5 years old. The toy bulldozer is over 3" high, 5" long, and 3" wide; the toy truck is over 4" high, 9" long, and 2" wide; the toy crane is over 8" high, 11" long, and 4" wide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars991 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
